Collection for sorting

settings.info: All collections are seperated by coma and space. The first - name of sorting. The second - name for showing all products by this sorting. The rest - collections for sorting

settings.label: Enable using of cookies
settings.info: If true, after opening of notification button, script makes a record in the cookie and the button won't show to the customer after page refresh.

settings.label: Unique identifier
settings.info: Unique identifier helps to show new messages when option "using of cookies" is enabled. Change it when you want to show a new message.

settings.label: Delay of showing
settings.info: Time in milliseconds

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: Icon for divider
settings.info: Use class name from [FontAwesome](http://fontawesome.io/icons/)
